about_the_game:
Try the Free to Play Prelude for the game Negligee: Spring Clean....

A Yuri/Lesbian themed visual novel story with multiple branches and endings.

The girls of the Lingerie shop are back and they are in for their toughest day of the year, a mega sale event!
How will the girls handle things when what seems like the entire town of Paradise Cove descends on the store to get the best deals and get some new intimate attire. The shop and the girls will only succeed with your help in this new instalment to the Negligee series.

In this prelude you can enjoy the main games introduction and morning events, check it out and enjoy a bit of fun with the girls of the lingerie store, in this free to play edition.

This game includes female character in lingerie outfits.
All characters shown within the game are 18 years of age or older.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game includes female characters in lingerie and sexually suggestive scenes between women.

All characters in the game are over 18 years old

detailed_description:

A Yuri/Lesbian themed visual novel story with multiple branches and endings.

The girls of the Lingerie shop are back and they are in for their toughest day of the year, a mega sale event!
How will the girls handle things when what seems like the entire town of Paradise Cove descends on the store to get the best deals and get some new intimate attire. The shop and the girls will only succeed with your help in this new instalment to the Negligee series.

In this prelude you can enjoy the main games introduction and morning events, check it out and enjoy a bit of fun with the girls of the lingerie store, in this free to play edition.

This game includes female character in lingerie outfits.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or better
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 +
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.6 or later
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

name: Negligee: Spring Clean Prelude

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: The girls of the Lingerie shop are back and they are in for their toughest day of the year, a mega sale event! Prelude is a free to play version of the LGBTQ+ Yuri visual novel game: Negligee: Spring Clean. Check it out now to see what you could be enjoying.
